net.objectzoo.delegates

Interface Function2<T1,T2,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - The type of the Function2's first parameter
    T2 - The type of the Function2's second parameter
    R - The type of the Function2's return value
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.BiFunction<T1,T2,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Function2AsyncSupport
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Function2<T1,T2,R>
extends java.util.function.BiFunction<T1,T2,R>
    A Function2 is a reference to a function with return value that can be invoked synchronously similar to a regular Java method call. To enable interoperability with Java 8 libraries Function2 is replaceable with its super interface BiFunction in many situations.
    Author:
    tilmann
